entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing near noon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries and rain showers beginning overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and flurries ending late in the morning then cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 20 in the morning then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023
